mapper.insert: insert into t_user set uid=#{uid}, upw=#{upw}, nm=#{nm}, pic=#{pic}
mapper.select: SELECT count(distinct F.ifeed) AS feedCnt , COUNT(L.ifeed) AS facVnt , U.nm,U.created_at AS createdAt FROM t_feed F left JOIN t_feed_fav L ON F.ifeed=L.ifeed right JOIN t_user U ON F.iuser=U.iuser WHERE U.iuser=#{targetIuser}
